name: StadiumSounds
0:
”Alexa, Open Stadium Sounds”
”Alexa, Start Stadium Sounds”
”Alexa, Play Stadium Sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stadium sounds
des: Get big game ready with the latest skill from ButtonPushApps. This Alexa skill is used to celebrate TOUCHDOWNS and other big plays during American football games. We named this skill StadiumSounds. This fun skill contains a sound file of a roaring tiger. Invoke the skill each time your Tiger named sports team scores - as a way to celebrate - just like you would hear if you were at the game live and in person!! .
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
